name: CeliaLib Mobile App
about: A mobile Application that helps peoples with celiac disease to check  the celiac approval of different products with easy search and instant fetching. The App helps them as well by providing detailed celiac free recipes with filtering based on different details.Using REST, the Ionic framework based App communicates with Symfony 2.7 PHP web server with offer different administrative tools for moderators like FOSUserBundle. Available on Android & iOS. You can find all open source files on GitHub.

name: BonPrixTunisie
about: Price comparison and review blog website for technology products in the Tunisian market, A personal project which I made in my first student engineering year. The site uses a custom HTMLDomParser which analysis all Tunisian e-commerce websites and retrieve prices. The site was also a technology articles reference regarding the Tunisian market. The project was held due to courses and other projects.

name: TETRAHEDRON Property
about: A Branding Identity project for a private property solution company in the US the design request was to create and illustration for water energy and nature, the three symbols of the company. Designed on Adobe Illustrator.

name: IEEE ENIC AESS
about: Branding logo for IEEE ENICarthage Aerospace & Electronic Systems Society SBC. Inspired from aeronautic and aerospace. Designed with Adobe Illustrator.

name: Training Poster
about: Print poster for a photoshop training held in ENICarthage engineering school. The design was made by Adobe Photoshop.
